title: Sparkling Petal Diamond Kada - Embrace Modern Elegance
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Hallmark) with Brilliant Cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
features: This kada showcases a repeating petal design, each set with four sparkling diamonds. The minimal bezel setting highlights the diamonds' brilliance. The rear of the bangle features a continuous beaded pattern in gold, creating a textured and sophisticated aesthetic.
colors: Radiant Yellow Gold and Dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. This piece complements both traditional South Indian attire and modern outfits.
description: This Kada is a fusion of modern design and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds sparkle with exceptional fire, while the sturdy gold construction ensures durability. Its lightweight and comfortable design makes it perfect for daily wear.
